title: Corporate Traveller scoops top business travel awardTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Corporate Traveller scoops top business travel award Published on : Wednesday, September 2, 2015
Corporate Traveller scooped the award for Best Travel Sales Team at the Business Traveller Africa Conference & Awards on Tuesday (1 September 2015).Corporate Traveller beat off Beachcomber Tours, Bidvest Car Rental, Protea Hotels, Flight Centre Business Travel and Thompsons Travel to win the top honour, which is based on excellence in new business sales, customer relationships, understanding customers’ needs and being outstanding brand ambassadors.
The awards are voted for by travel buyers as well as the business travel industry.Corporate Traveller – the travel management company that guarantees to save businesses time and money – was in good company, with South African Airways, Emirates, Tsogo Sun and Avis among the winners.
The fourth annual Business Traveller Africa Conference & Awards, sponsored by Absa, was held at the Maslow Hotel in Sandton, Johannesburg on 1 September 2015. Launched in 2012, the awards honour the best in the South African business travel trade.
“We are thrilled to take home this award. Our people and their commitment to providing outstanding personal service are the foundation of our business, and we are so proud to be recognised at this level. We dedicate this award to our loyal customers, without whom we could not have done it,” said Corporate Traveller marketing manager Michelle Jolley.
Source:-Corporate Traveller
